revised_title: The Remarkable Abilities of the Cancer Major (Giant Crab)
tldr: The author, Peter Collinson, shares his observations on the Cancer Major, or giant crab, and its remarkable abilities. These crabs can voluntarily break and shed their legs or claws, regenerate new ones, and even return to their original habitat after being relocated. The author also discusses the crabs' aggressive behavior and their ability to save their lives by sacrificing a limb when attacked by another crab.
